extendedInfo.description: PLEASE NOTE:There is an issue with the Samsung Galaxy S2 that prevents Mobile Signal Widget PRO from working correctly.  There is nothing I can do to fix this.  "Freezing": This was a feature I added to detect when the widget update service had been killed, it is not a bug in the widget. If my widget detects that it has "freezed", check that you are not running any task killing applications.PRO version features:5 appearance options, including transparent background.Tap to configure - Change widget appearance without re-adding.V1.2 - Fixed operator and signal strength not returning.New 2x1 widget featuring separate bars for signal and Wi-Fi strength.COMING:More options, more widget sizes and skins!

reviews.comment: Great widget works 100% on HTC incredible 2.2 much more accurate than stock. love the double widget.10***+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App. Better than the small one up in ur Notification Bar. Works Great. Thanks. Vibrant Galaxy S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: I like this app but it needs more options. Also this app freezes about once an hr . ZTE 768 running 2.3.7 i\'ll re-rate if ever an update
reviews.author: william kangas

reviews.comment: Works great on Droid X ApeX Gingerbread. All other signal strength apps for gb have not worked. It says it won\'t but it does. Had it for a year. A+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is constantly \"freezing\".
reviews.comment: Every now n than I need to Unfreeze and activate widget. Please fix this problem by next update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezing IS a bug in the widget
reviews.comment: Freezing IS a bug in the widget!   I have no app killer and none of my other widgets are freezing or getting killed.   Seems to freeze when I have no signal.  Apparently a broken unsupported app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Db rating is the way to go if you want an accurate reading. Thumbs up! Using on Verizon DX 2.3.3 v 595.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent for single sim
reviews.comment: I want to request the developers to make this widget for dual sim phones also so that it can also show the info of second sim otherwise it\'s a perfect app for me . it never troubled me in any way . I want to have two more kind of widgets even if it is a paid one . 1. Dual sim info having interface just like the 2*1 widget for sim and WiFi. 2. A 3*1 widget showing dual sim and WiFi . I have a lot of hope from you guys as I like this widget very much and have used it conveniently across various androids :-)
reviews.author: Suneet Pathak

reviews.comment: Will not show wifi details in android 2.3 on nexus s. Freezes too much on 2.3. Please fix this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wifi strength does not work (DROID) Force closes, and author only gives you 15 minutes to refund. Not worth it till problems fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well G2x 2.3.3
reviews.comment: I was happy to find this wonderful little widget still works in 2.3.3 on my G2x. Great for full-screen launchers and a hidden notification bar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice!!! 5 starz when we can start changing colors and customize. Nice if you made a get rid of notification signal bar also!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice App. The Free Version Is Also Nice. This App Is A Must-Have!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the Freeze!
reviews.comment: Its been a year....hell....5*, started going down 6 months after the freezes became a commonly req fix.,-1*a month till a fix! Who\'s with me?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Something seems like its missing .... perhaps an update could suffice this vague annoyance. Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars when we have a widget for 4G with signal strength - EVO. 6 months later no updates...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked great on my Evo when I was with Sprint, but now that my Evo is on PagePlus it shows no signal even with full bars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken under 2.3, also breaks WiFi
reviews.comment: It worked fine under Android 2.2. But under 2.3 (CM7) it is constantly \"freezing\". It happens when you exit one WiFi network area and enter another WiFi network area. And to add insult to the injury, when this widget freezes, it also somehow prevents the phone from acquiring another WiFi network connection. I uninstalled the widget, and the problem with WiFi connection handover disappeared.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice little widget, simple and clean. Just what I want for when my status bar is hidden. X10i
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A useful widget that everyone needs. Go Pro to show your support. Its worth it for a program you\'ll use everyday. G2
reviews.author: A Google User
